code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:M gem cutter aged 56 years complains of critical double vision, critical difficulty seeing at night and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat and other medical problems. NKDA. he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 166 cm, Weight 70.6 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 95, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, subjective refraction myopic shift noted a:Cataracts p:performed subjective refraction, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:patient presents with critical double vision of 5 weeks duration together with critical difficulty seeing at night. pt is a 57 YO M gem cutter. o:Height 167 cm, Weight 72.3 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 64, SystolicBP 116, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17, subjective refraction myopic shift noted a:Cataracts p:performed subjective refraction, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
